sentence.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, HES7 and DUSP6 genes have been proved to be involved in the etiopathogenesis of congenital scoliosis (CS) in animal embryo studies, however, whether this association was detected in human CS patients also remains unknown.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: MESP2, mesoderm development and DUSP6 genes may not be involved in the etiopathogenesis of sporadic and non-syndromic CS in Chinese Han population
